Table of Contents

Class: RuleBase daxfi/Rule.py

Class that define a firewall rule.

A firewall rule is described with a RuleData object, the action to be taken for this rule and an optional ruleNumber (only for certain actions).

        self,
        rd=RuleData(),
        action='',

Create a new rule.

rd

The RuleData object which describes the rule.

action

The action to be taken for this rule.

ruleNumber

The optional rule number (useful for 'insert'-like rules).

  _getRuleCommand  
_getRuleCommand ( self )

Return a string used to run the command for this rule.

By default, just return the list of attributes of the RuleData object. This method must be override in the Rule class that inherits from this class.

  copy  
copy ( self )

Return a copy of itself.

  getAction  
getAction ( self )

Get the action for this rule.

Return the action, one of the values in xml_actions.

  getBareXML  
getBareXML ( self )

Return the bare XML representation of the rule, without the action and the rule number.
